channel.title: Where in kick()?

item.title: Where in kick()?
item.dc:creator: @Spyker8 Spyker8
item.description:
@Spyker8 wrote:

I need a command to kick somebody to login screen, I have a working one, but it doesn’t send them to login screen. Which means I have to put outStream.createFrame(109); directFlushOutStream(); somewhere in the kick(); part of playerhandler.java right?

But where in kick(); do I put it? =S

Here’s what it looks like in my PlayerHandler.java, if somebody could edit outStream.createFrame(109); directFlushOutStream(); into it I would be quite happy.

if(players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(kickNick)) { players[i].kick(); kickNick=""; }

Read full topic
